content.question: A <math alttext="5.0 gram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> sample of <math alttext="M g C l 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MgCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> may contain measurable amounts of other compounds as impurities. Which of the following quantities is (are) needed to determine that the sample is pure <math alttext="M g C l 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The color and density of the sample
The mass of <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the sample only
The number of moles of <math alttext="C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the sample only

The mass of <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and the mass of <math alttext="C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the sample

content.answer: The mass of <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and the mass of <math alttext="C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the sample
